{/* */}

I’m a Product Designer with over a decade of user-centered design experience under my belt. With every project, I strive to create effective UX that engages users and provides them with intuitive flow. My UI is pixel-perfect and is influenced by modern grid-based design principles. I have a strong background in mobile design for both iOS and Android. I’ve helped design successful mobile, tablet, and web products for some of the tech industry's largest companies. During my time as a Product Designer, I’ve worked on over 50+ products. I'm a Product Designer with a decade of industry experience crafting engaging and delightful product experiences. I advocate for the needs of users and always strive to create the most simple and intuitive UX to help people get things done.

{/*

I love learning, and get giddily excited about podcasts, Maria Popova's inspiring life lessons, and Atlas Obscura's latest obscure discoveries.

I love creating and making things. I drool over beautiful illustrations, photos, videos, DIY's, architecture, any form of creative expressions really. I want to learn them all! At the moment, I'm focused on ballet and watercolor!

Laugh, dance, travel, read, live life to the fullest. I don't sleep enough, but I dream.

*/}

Work History

Facebook — Senior Product Designer {/*
I design, code, and do everything in between to create a delightful product that our users love! */}

Gusto — Senior Product Designer {/*
I design, code, and do everything in between to create a delightful product that our users love! */}

Quantcast — Senior User Experience Designer {/*
I solved data visualization problems, from user research, information architecture, wireframes, interactive prototypes, to visual design, style guide and front-end development. */}

Apple — User Experience Designer {/*
I designed and prototyped enterprise software for iPhone, iPad and desktop. */}

Apple — Front-end UI Engineer {/*
I made sure the Apple Online Store was fast, interactive, and pixel-perfect. */}

{/*

Cornell University Web Developer/Designer — 3 years
I designed and developed websites for a variety of school organizations.

*/}

Expertise

  • Interaction / UX Design
  • Visual / UI Design
  • Information Architecture
  • Product Strategy
  • Concepting
  • Wireframes
  • User Research
  • Data Visualization
  • Prototyping (Framer, Origami, Invision, Figma, Keynote)
  • Front-end Development (HTML, CSS, Javascript/React)
  • Spec Docs
  • Photography
  • Watercolor
  • Hand Lettering
  • Ballet
  • Flute
); }
